Package org.onehippo.forge.properties.api

Interface PropertiesManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPropertiesManager, CachingMapPropertiesManagerImpl, CachingPropertiesManagerImpl, PropertiesManagerImpl
    public interface PropertiesManager
    Manager for finding properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getDefaultDocumentLocation()
      Get the location where properties are searched.
      String getDefaultDocumentName()
      Get the default name of the property documents that are searched for.
      Map<String,​String> getProperties​(String[] paths, org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
      Deprecated.
      Replaced by #getPropertiesBeans(final List names, final HippoBean baseBean).
      Map<String,​String> getProperties​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
      Deprecated.
      Replaced by #getPropertiesBean(final HippoBean baseBean).
      PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(String path, org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
      Get the bean representing the properties document with the given name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(String path, org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean, Locale locale)
      Get the bean representing the properties document with the given name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
      Get the bean representing the properties document with the configured default name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean, Locale locale)
      Get the bean representing the properties document with the configured default name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      List<PropertiesBean> getPropertiesBeans​(List<String> paths, org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
      Get the beans representing the properties documents with the given names at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      List<PropertiesBean> getPropertiesBeans​(List<String> paths, org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean, Locale locale)
      Get the beans representing the properties documents with the given names at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
      void invalidate​(String canonicalPath)
      Invalidate a cached document based on the canonical path of a properties document, or invalidate all if the path is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultDocumentLocation

        String getDefaultDocumentLocation()
        Get the location where properties are searched. The location is relative to the baseBean in the API methods, whether it starts with '/' or not.

      • getDefaultDocumentName

        String getDefaultDocumentName()
        Get the default name of the property documents that are searched for.

      • getPropertiesBean

        PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
        Get the bean representing the properties document with the configured default name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location (if location does not start with slash), normally the siteContentBaseBean.

      • getPropertiesBean

        PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean,
                                 Locale locale)
        Get the bean representing the properties document with the configured default name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location (if location does not start with slash), normally the siteContentBaseBean.
        locale - the locale by which to try to retrieve linked translated properties.

      • getPropertiesBean

        PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(String path,
                                 org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
        Get the bean representing the properties document with the given name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        path - the relative paths of the properties documents to search for
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location (if location does not start with slash), normally the siteContentBaseBean.

      • getPropertiesBean

        PropertiesBean getPropertiesBean​(String path,
                                 org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean,
                                 Locale locale)
        Get the bean representing the properties document with the given name at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        path - the relative path of the properties documents to search for
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location (if location does not start with slash), normally the siteContentBaseBean.
        locale - the locale by which to try to retrieve linked translated properties.

      • getPropertiesBeans

        List<PropertiesBean> getPropertiesBeans​(List<String> paths,
                                        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
        Get the beans representing the properties documents with the given names at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        paths - the relative paths of the properties documents to search for
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location, normally the siteContentBaseBean.

      • getPropertiesBeans

        List<PropertiesBean> getPropertiesBeans​(List<String> paths,
                                        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean,
                                        Locale locale)
        Get the beans representing the properties documents with the given names at the configured location, relative to the given base bean (if configured location does not start with slash).
        Parameters:
        paths - the relative paths of the properties documents to search for
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location, normally the siteContentBaseBean.
        locale - the locale by which to try to retrieve linked translated properties.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,​String> getProperties​(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
        Deprecated.
        Replaced by #getPropertiesBean(final HippoBean baseBean). Use PropertiesUtil to get a Map directly.
        Returns a map with String name/value pairs. Get the properties from the document with the default name at the default location.
        Parameters:
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location, normally the siteContentBaseBean.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,​String> getProperties​(String[] paths,
                                       org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean baseBean)
        Deprecated.
        Replaced by #getPropertiesBeans(final List names, final HippoBean baseBean). Use PropertiesUtil to get a Map directly.
        Returns a map with String name/value pairs. Get the properties from the documents with the given names at the default location. If multiple documents are found they are merged into one map.
        Parameters:
        paths - the relative paths of the properties documents to search for
        baseBean - the base bean from where to get the properties location, normally the siteContentBaseBean.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate​(String canonicalPath)
        Invalidate a cached document based on the canonical path of a properties document, or invalidate all if the path is null.
        Parameters:
        canonicalPath - the path of a properties document, relative to the base bean, or null.
